ai-tha-ap349:1.3_0: And the Buddha also came to be awakened for themselves,
ai-tha-ap349:2.4_0: a pile of up future lives.
ai-tha-ap349:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap349:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap349:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Paṇḍuka.
ai-tha-ap349:6.1_0: and the seventh part of the senior monks.
